StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Authorized Amount (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount.description: Amount of a stock repurchase plan authorized by an entity's Board of Directors.

StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount1.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Authorized Amount
StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount1.description: Amount of stock repurchase plan authorized.

StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingAuthorize.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Remaining Authorized Repurchase Amount
StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingAuthorize.description: Amount remaining of a stock repurchase plan authorized.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ChangeInTaxRateIn.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Change in Tax Rate, Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ChangeInTaxRateIn.description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) for remeasurement of deferred tax from change in tax rate pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxForA.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Liability
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxForA.description: Amount of tax liability from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

UndistributedContinuingOperationEarnings.label: Undistributed Continuing Operation Earnings (Loss), Allocation to Participating Securities, Basic
UndistributedContinuingOperationEarnings.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations allocated to participating securities for basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

UndistributedContinuingOperationEarnings.label: Undistributed Continuing Operation Earnings (Loss), Allocation to Participating Securities, Diluted
UndistributedContinuingOperationEarnings.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations allocated to participating securities for diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of expense for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.label: Write off of Deferred Debt Issuance Cost
WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.description: Write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance cost in an extinguishment of debt.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

ConversionOfStockSharesConverted1.label: Conversion of Stock, Shares Converted
ConversionOfStockSharesConverted1.description: "The number of shares converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

ConvertibleDebt.label: Convertible Debt
ConvertibleDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying amount of debt identified as being convertible into another form of financial instrument (typically the entity's common stock) as of the balance sheet date, which originally required full repayment more than twelve months after issuance or greater than the normal operating cycle of the company.

DeferredTaxAssetsInProcessResearchAndDev.label: Deferred Tax Assets, in Process Research and Development
DeferredTaxAssetsInProcessResearchAndDev.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from in-process research and development costs expensed in connection with a business combination.

GoodwillGross.label: Goodwill, Gross
GoodwillGross.description: Amount before accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillImpairedAccumulatedImpairmentLos.label: Goodwill, Impaired, Accumulated Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairedAccumulatedImpairmentLos.description: Amount of accumulated impairment loss for an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

IncomeTaxExaminationLiabilityRefundAdjus.label: Income Tax Examination, Liability (Refund) Adjustment from Settlement with Taxing Authority
IncomeTaxExaminationLiabilityRefundAdjus.description: The amount of the additional liability or refund received or expected based on a final settlement with a taxing authority.
